channel.title: Stockwatch - Key Events
channel.description: Real-time corporate announcements, deals, and financial results.

item.title: [SAKUMA] Sakuma Exports Ltd to Approve Q4 Results on Feb 14, 2026
item.description:
Sakuma Exports Ltd has announced that its Board of Directors will meet on February 14, 2026, to consider and approve the Un-Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter ended 31st December 2025. The meeting will also consider and approve the Limited Review Report (Standalone and Consolidated) by the statutory Auditor of the Company. The trading window for dealing in securities of the Company will remain closed from 1st January, 2026, and will open 48 hours after the declaration of the said Financial Results.

  • Sakuma Exports Ltd to consider and approve Q4 results for the year 2025 on Feb 14, 2026
  • The meeting will also approve the Limited Review Report by the statutory Auditor
  • Trading window for dealing in securities of the Company will remain closed from 1st January, 2026

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: SAKUMA EXPORTS LTD. | Category: Quarterly Result

item.title: [ASHAPURMIN] Independent Director, Mr. Pundarik Sanyal, Completes His Second Term at Ashapura Minechem Ltd
item.description:
Ashapura Minechem Ltd announces the completion of the second term of Mr. Pundarik Sanyal as an Independent Director. He ceased to be the Independent Director from the close of business hours on 08th February, 2026. The Board of Directors acknowledges his valuable contributions and guidance during his tenure.

  • Mr. Pundarik Sanyal completes his second term as an Independent Director at Ashapura Minechem Ltd.
  • He ceased to be the Independent Director from the close of business hours on 08th February, 2026.
  • The Board of Directors acknowledges his valuable contributions and guidance during his tenure.

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: ASHAPURA MINECHEM LTD. | Category: Board Meeting

item.title: [URAVI] Uravi Defence and Technology Ltd. Announces EGM for Shareholder Approval on Key Decisions
item.description:
Uravi Defence and Technology Ltd., formerly known as Uravi T & Wedge Lamps Limited, has announced an Extra Ordinary General Meeting (EGM) to be held on March 02, 2026, at 4.00 P.M. The meeting will be conducted through video conferencing in accordance with MCA and SEBI guidelines. The agenda includes the appointment of M/S Viren Gandhi & Co as the new Statutory Auditors, consideration of a proposal for disinvestment in SKL India Private Limited, and approval of a material related party transaction for disinvestment of 50.01% shareholding in SKL. The remote e-voting will commence on February 27, 2026, and end on March 01, 2026.

  • Appointment of M/S Viren Gandhi & Co as Statutory Auditors.
  • Consideration of a proposal for disinvestment in SKL India Private Limited.
  • Approval of a material related party transaction for disinvestment of 50.01% shareholding in SKL.

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Uravi T And Wedge Lamps Ltd | Category: Board Meeting

item.title: [HCG] HealthCare Global Enterprises Ltd. to Consider Fund Raise by Rights Issue on Feb 17, 2026
item.description:
HealthCare Global Enterprises Ltd. has announced that its Board of Directors will meet on February 17, 2026, to consider and approve a proposal for a fund raise through a rights issue. The company's trading window for dealing in securities will be closed for all designated persons from February 9, 2026, to February 26, 2026, in accordance with the Company's Code of Conduct for Prevention of Insider Trading.

  • HealthCare Global Enterprises Ltd. to consider a fund raise by rights issue on Feb 17, 2026
  • The company's trading window for dealing in securities will be closed for all designated persons from Feb 9, 2026, to Feb 26, 2026

Company: HealthCare Global Enterprises Ltd | Category: Investment

item.title: [DATIWARE] Datiware Maritime Infra Ltd to Approve Q4 2025 Unaudited Financial Results on Feb 14, 2026
item.description:
Datiware Maritime Infra Ltd has announced a Board of Directors meeting on February 14, 2026, to consider and approve the unaudited financial results for the quarter ended on December 31, 2025. This is in accordance with Regulation 29(1)(a) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015.

  • Datiware Maritime Infra Ltd has scheduled a Board of Directors meeting on February 14, 2026.
  • The meeting will consider and approve the unaudited financial results for the quarter ended on December 31, 2025.
  • This announcement is in compliance with Regulation 29(1)(a) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015.

item.title: [ASINPET] Asian Petroproducts & Exports Ltd to Approve Un-Audited Financial Statements for Q3 2025 on Feb 14, 2026
item.description:
Asian Petroproducts & Exports Ltd has announced that its Board of Directors will meet on February 14, 2026, to consider and approve the Un-Audited Financial Statements for the third quarter ended on December 31, 2025. In compliance with the SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations, 2015, the trading window for all designated persons as defined under the Company's Code of Conduct will be closed from January 1, 2026, to February 16, 2026. The trading window will reopen from February 17, 2026.

  • Asian Petroproducts & Exports Ltd to consider and approve Un-Audited Financial Statements for Q3 2025
  • Board Meeting scheduled on February 14, 2026
  • Trading window to remain closed from January 1, 2026, to February 16, 2026
  • Trading window to reopen from February 17, 2026

item.title: [SHK] S H Kelkar and Company Ltd Announces Q3 & 9M FY2026 Results: Revenue from Operations at Rs. 1,718 crore, EBITDA at Rs. 182 crore
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

S H Kelkar and Company Limited (SHK), the largest Indian origin Fragrance and Flavour Company in India, has announced its financial results for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2025. The company reported a revenue from operations of Rs. 1,718 crore and an EBITDA of Rs. 182 crore for the nine months ended FY2026. The company is investing in strategic initiatives for long-term growth, including strengthening global Creative Development Centres and expanding capacity. The US Creative Development Centre secured its first customer order during the quarter.

  • Revenue from operations at Rs. 1,718 crore for 9M FY2026
  • EBITDA stood at Rs. 182 crore for 9M FY2026
  • Adjusted EBITDA at Rs. 240 crore for 9M FY2026
  • US Creative Development Centre secured its first customer order
  • Investing in strategic initiatives for long-term growth

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: S H Kelkar and Company Ltd | Category: Quarterly Result

item.title: [BRIJLEAS] Brijlaxmi Leasing & Finance Ltd to Approve Q3 Financial Statements on Feb 14, 2026
item.description:
Brijlaxmi Leasing & Finance Ltd has scheduled a Board Meeting on February 14, 2026, to consider and approve the Un-Audited Financial Statements for the Third Quarter ended on December 31, 2025. The trading window for dealing in securities of the Company will be closed from January 1, 2026, for all designated persons and will open 48 hours after the announcement of the results.

  • Brijlaxmi Leasing & Finance Ltd to hold a Board Meeting on February 14, 2026
  • The meeting will consider and approve Un-Audited Financial Statements for Q3 2025
